articles.author: Aaditya Narayan in Chennai
articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy: India left frustrated by Japan's penalty corner defending masterclass - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: "They did very well in that space, they did that in the World Cup as well, so it's not like it just happened tonight," India coach Craig Fulton said.
articles.content: One knew what (in this case, who) was coming, yet it seemed like India's dragflickers simply couldn't find a way to consistently score past them. Raiki Fujishima and Shota Yamada will have physical s… [+3204 chars]
